# Hours in a Week

> Number of hours in a week.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var HOURS_IN_WEEK = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/hours-in-week' );
```

#### HOURS_IN_WEEK

Number of hours in a week.

``` javascript
HOURS_IN_WEEK === 168;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var HOURS_IN_WEEK = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/hours-in-week' );

console.log( HOURS_IN_WEEK );
// => 168
```
